entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, introduced as he is exploring the house.

entities.name: house-elves
entities.description: A group of elves that Harry sees on the wall, described as having snoutlike noses.

entities.name: darkest of wizards
entities.description: A concept used to describe the owner of the house, implying a dark and powerful wizard.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, mentioned as being involved in explaining something to him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, mentioned as being involved in explaining something to him.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Harry's godfather, mentioned as hurrying off downstairs again.

relationships.description: Harry sees the house-elves on the wall.
Ron and Hermione are mentioned as being involved in explaining something to Harry together.
